  • 2021: HTML & CSS

    Modern HTML & CSS from the beginning (Inclusing Sass)

  • 2020: OVB Allfinanz

    Financial Broker

    Preparing and introducing indivitual projects to clients. The goal of the project itself was to help people orient themselves in a complex world of finance regardless of their background. Our services consist of providing unbiased information about the financial market, the consequences of pension reforms, the new civil code and the like. Our consultations are completely free, while our life long service is a guarantee of a long-term cooperation with our clients for their needs.

  • 2019: Deutsche Börse

    Network Engineer

    Monitoring of all data services. Providing troubleshooting on Cisco/Juniper platform (EIGRP, BGP, Multicast) Communication with external providers of leased lines/customers. Provisioning of new services.

  • 2018: VERIZON CZECH s.r.o / OKIN Business Process Services

    Change Control Engineer

    Technical support of Verizon Clients. Need to comunicate with clients via phone or tickets. Evaluate and prepare changes based on customers request and supervisor the network after the changes.

  • 2016: VERIZON CZECH s.r.o / OKIN Business Process Services

    Network Engineer

    Technical support of Verizon Clients via ticketing system in regards to fix site issues as soon as possible. Need to have a good knowledge and orientation in internal systems, customerś orders/change requests, cooperation with cisco agents in regards to replace cisco device. Involved adaptation to quickly changing internal processes. Major cases were hard down issue, packet loss, bouncing, IOS upgrade and replacement.
